entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
